breonna-taylor.name: Breonna Taylor
breonna-taylor.description: Woman killed in her sleep by LMPD police officers in Louisville, KY. Breonna Taylor, a Grand Rapids native, moved to Louisville in order to pursue her dream of being an EMT and helping people who need it most. She was known to be a great person.

george-floyd.name: George Floyd
george-floyd.description: Man killed by disgraced officer Derek Chauvin. His murder sparked a national outrage that is still being carried on to this day
